name: Toragi the Frog
aura: Increases Ally RESIST in all battles by 40.

skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. The chance increases by 5% for each debuff on the enemy team.

Places a [Shield] buff equal to 15% of this championâ€™s MAX HP and a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Also heals this champion by 25% of their MAX HP and places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on them for 3 turns. The heal increases by 2.5% for each [Poison] debuff on the enemy team.
When attacks, has a 50% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] Debuff on the attacker for 2 turns. Occurs once per hit.
